title: I feel sorry for the Golds that have to play me in S5.
body:
You can blame Riot for making me once again shit on low players and ruin the experience for them.

Maybe the third time I go from Gold to D3 in a 5 day span (on stream) Riot will finally get the picture that I am just a true Diamond unlike these S3/S4 welfare Diamonds.

I recommend waiting a few days after the reset.

http://i.imgur.com/PvBMOeD.jpg
